00018 #ifndef __TLM_HELPERS_H__
00019 #define __TLM_HELPERS_H__
00020 
00021 //#include <sys/param.h>
00022 //#include <cstring>
00023 
00024 namespace tlm {
00025 
00026 enum tlm_endianness { TLM_UNKNOWN_ENDIAN, TLM_LITTLE_ENDIAN, TLM_BIG_ENDIAN };
00027 
00028 inline bool hostHasLittleEndianness()
00029 {
00030   static tlm_endianness host_endianness     = TLM_UNKNOWN_ENDIAN;
00031   static bool           host_little_endian  = false;
00032   
00033   if ( host_endianness == TLM_UNKNOWN_ENDIAN )
00034   {
00035     const unsigned char   endian_array [ 2 ] = { 1, 0 };
00036   
00037           unsigned short  endian_short       = *(unsigned short *) endian_array;
00038   
00039     host_little_endian = ( endian_short == 1 );
00040   }
00041 
00042   return host_little_endian;
00043 }
00044 
00045 inline bool hasHostEndianness(tlm_endianness endianness)
00046 {
00047   if (hostHasLittleEndianness()) {
00048     return endianness == TLM_LITTLE_ENDIAN;
00049 
00050   } else {
00051     return endianness == TLM_BIG_ENDIAN;
00052   }
00053 } 
00054 
00055 inline unsigned char swap_bytes(unsigned char rhs)  { return rhs; }
00056 inline char swap_bytes(char rhs) { return rhs; }
00057 inline signed char swap_bytes(signed char rhs) { return rhs; }
00058 
00059 inline unsigned short swap_bytes(unsigned short rhs) { return (rhs >> 8) | (rhs << 8); }
00060 inline signed short swap_bytes(signed short rhs) { return swap_bytes((unsigned short)rhs); }
00061 
00062 inline unsigned int swap_bytes(unsigned int rhs) { return (rhs << 24) | (rhs >> 24) | ((rhs << 8) & 0x00FF0000) | ((rhs >> 8) & 0x0000FF00); }
00063 inline signed int swap_bytes(signed int rhs) { return swap_bytes((unsigned int)rhs); }
00064 
00065 inline unsigned long swap_bytes(unsigned long rhs) { return (rhs << 24) | (rhs >> 24) | ((rhs << 8) & 0x00FF0000) | ((rhs >> 8) & 0x0000FF00); }
00066 inline signed long swap_bytes(signed long rhs) { return swap_bytes((unsigned long)rhs); }
00067 
00068 inline unsigned long long swap_bytes(unsigned long long rhs) { return (static_cast<unsigned long long>(swap_bytes((unsigned long)rhs)) << 32) | swap_bytes((unsigned long)(rhs >> 32)); }
00069 inline signed long long swap_bytes(signed long long rhs) { return swap_bytes((unsigned long long)rhs); }
00070 
00071 
00072 
00073 //
00074 // Copy data from src / dest
00075 // swaps the bytes if needed (simulated endianness != host endianness)
00076 //
00077 inline void copy_data(const unsigned char* src, unsigned char* dest,
00078                       unsigned int nrOfBytes, tlm_endianness endianness)
00079 {
00080   if (hasHostEndianness(endianness)) {
00081     memcpy(dest, src, nrOfBytes);
00082 
00083   } else {
00084     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nrOfBytes; ++i) {
00085       dest[i] = src[nrOfBytes - 1 - i];
00086     }
00087   }
00088 }
00089 
00090 //
00091 // Swap bytes if needed (simulated endianness != host endianness)
00092 //
00093 template <typename DT>
00094 inline DT swapIfNeeded(DT word, tlm_endianness endianness)
00095 {
00096   if (hasHostEndianness(endianness)) {
00097     return word;
00098 
00099   } else {
00100     return swap_bytes(word);
00101   }
00102 }
00103 
00104 } // namespace tlm

00106 #endif /* __TLM_HELPERS_H__ */
